title: How Owen Farrell's inspirational speeches have emerged as England's secret World Cup weapon
text:
Captain Owen Farrell's inspirational eve-of-match briefings have emerged as England's secret weapon in their run to Saturday's World Cup final - and he is all set to deliver the most important one of his life as Eddie Jones' men bid to win the trophy for the first time since Jonny Wilkinson secured victory against Australia 16 years ago.

Farrell's team-talks are heard in complete silence at the nerve-centre team room as the squad focus on his key messages, hooker Jamie George revealed in a rare and fascinating glimpse into England's inner-sanctum. You can "hear a pin-drop" said George, Farrell's Saracen's team-mate.

As England gear up for their biggest game in 12 years as they seek revenge over...
description: Captain Owen Farrell's inspirational eve-of-match briefings have emerged as England's secret weapon in their run to Saturday's World Cup final - and he is all set to deliver the most important one of his life as Eddie Jones' men bid to win the trophy for the first time since Jonny Wilkinson secured victory against Australia 16 years ago.
